docs.title: CyberPatriot Runbook
docs.text: Welcome to the CyberPatriot Runbook documentation. This site is deployed via GitHub Pages and built with MkDocs.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
• Install dependencies: pip install -r requirements.txt
  • Run the app: python main.py
  • Database setup: see database_setup.sql and init_database.py

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• User roles: admin, coach, captain, member
  • Team creation and join requests
  • Dashboards for admin, coach, member
  • Audit logging and notes/checklists

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text:
1. Create a branch
  2. Commit changes
  3. Open a pull request

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text: The GitHub Actions workflow builds this site and publishes to the gh-pages branch.
